Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The content inside the OpenCms Virtual File System can be accessed using CMIS, the Content Management Interoperability Services. Here, we give a small practical example of accessing a running OpenCms instance via CMIS, followed by more detailed information about the CMIS implementation of OpenCms. We do not describe the CMIS standard in depth. Therefore, we refer you to the CMIS specification.
